ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah don t know aboot all NPCs bein that way but ALOT are (contrary to what others balieve).  Ah know (becuase Ah did it with a few peeps) that Zimmel (tha
ygData.messageBody:
Ah don't know aboot all NPCs bein' that way but ALOT are (contrary to what
others balieve). Ah know (becuase Ah did it with a few peeps) that Zimmel
(tha begger in tha jail under tha Freeport areana) will accept itmes that
way.

Ye might be able ta give it shot.

Lincus
E'ci

>From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Quests
>Date: Fri, 05 Nov 1999 16:05:08 EST
>
>I want to do the rain caller quest but at 19 i dont think i will survive in
>Kedge keep for more than 10 seconds...hardly enough time to camp a lvl 50+
>mermaid with a few full groups of lvl 50s and loot the body.
>
>I was thinking, in quests like the CB belt quest, when you give nusbuk only
>1 shoulder pad he tells you to kill another legonier and bring him a second
>pad for your reward. if another person gives him 1 pad he thinks he has
>goten 2 and gives the EXP and reward for the quest to the last person to
>hand him an item.
>
>Are all NPCs like that?
>Basicaly i need to give the mermaid hair(no drop) gorilla hair(no drop) and
>an old wig to fuzzlecutter in Fp...i can get the wig but the gorilla hair
>and the mermaid hair are imposible for me. Could i hire a few lvl 50s to
>kill the mermaid and loot the hair and the gorillas in cazic and loot the
>hair. then if Freeport they could hand those to Fuzzlecutter, then i hand
>him the wig...any opinions on wether it would work or not?
>
>Trevalien
>Dieing for a Rain Caller Bow!!
